original_text: When the people hear the sound from both trumpets, all the people must meet you. They must meet you at the door of the Tent of Meeting.
korean_text: 나팔 두 개를 불 때에는 온 회중이 회막 문 앞에 모여서 네게로 나아올 것이요

sentences.original_text: When the people hear the sound from both trumpets,
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 양쪽 나팔 소리를 들을 때,

sentences.original_text: all the people must meet you.
They must meet you at the door of the Tent of Meeting.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 회막 문 앞에서 당신을 만나야 합니다.
